HediffDef.label: gut mechanites
HediffDef.description: Semi-coherent mechanites that inhabit the large intestine. Greatly decrease likelihood of food poisoning and help process environmental toxicity, but cause considerable pain. This particular strain comes from the digestive tract of toxin-processing animals.

HediffDef.label: scaria neurosa
HediffDef.description: A case of the latent scaria infection localized in the peripheral neurous system. Untransmutable and relatively benign, it results in a great deal of chronic pain.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: A latent scaria infection. Does not affect behavior, but causes pain.

HediffDef.label: psychic bond anesthesia
HediffDef.description: Pscychic anesthesia caused by a strong bond with another creature.
